flawed_nl_solution:
Three dimes is equal to $0.3 because 3 x 0.1 = <<3*0.1=0.3>>0.3
Seven nickels is equal to $0.35 because 7 x 0.05 = <<7*0.05=0.35>>0.35
Each time he trades with dimes he lose $0.5 because 0.3 - 0.25 = <<0.3-0.25=0.5>>0.5
Each time he traded with nickels he lost $0.1 because 0.35 - 0.25 = <<0.35-0.25=0.1>>0.1
He lost $10 from trading with dimes because 20 x 0.5 =<<20*0.5=10>>10
He lost $2 from trading with nickels because 20 x 0.1 = <<20*0.1=2>>2
He lost $12 total because 10 + 2 = <<10+2=12>>12
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.050000000000000044, not 0.5. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
